ygData.subject: Re: Cracked Flute - Spoiler?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually if you kill the hermit a few times he will drop the cracked flute, it weighs alot so i destroyed it =) Probably part of a quest. Karnek D Jester ...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually if you kill the hermit a few times he will drop the cracked flute,
it weighs alot so i destroyed it =) Probably part of a quest.
Karnek D'Jester
